content.p: May you wish to contact me, this is my e-mail address: mvermaat at cs.vu.nl.

This website was constructed with maximum accessibility for the less-abled visitor in mind. No Javascript is used, and all pages are equally usable with or without stylesheet. Alternate stylesheets provide two high-contrast versions of the website.
Technically, all pages should be XHTML 1.1 strict with valid CSS 2. It is a known fact they do not have the theoretically correct mimetype. Get over it.
The entire website is generated from some XML source files with a simple homegrown framework based on Apache Ant.
All content and sourcecode of this website is stored in my Subversion repository, which also hosts sources of most of my other documents and projects.
